Sentencas: Previous studies have found that in ceramic fuel cells using Ni0 center dot 8Co0 center dot 15Al0 center dot 05LiO2 (NCAL) as the electrode, lithium compounds such as LiOH generated by reduction of NCAL anode by H-2 diffuse into oxide electrolyte membranes such as Gd0.1Ce0 center dot 9O2 (GDC), and the GDC-lithium compounds composite electrolyte formed online is an excellent proton conductor.
Titulo: Preparation and performance evaluation of low temperature SOEC using lithium compounds as electrodes

Sentencas: In this paper, the low-temperature electrolysis performance of proton conductor type solid oxide electrolysis cell (P-SOEC) with GDC as electrolyte and NCAL as electrode for direct electrochemical conversion of H2O into H-2 was investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and performance evaluation of low temperature SOEC using lithium compounds as electrodes

Sentencas: It is found that at operation temperature of 550 degrees C, the current density of the SOEC prepared in this paper can reach 2.263 A cm(-2) at 1.6 V. The composite electrolyte in the electrolysis cell reaches an ionic conductivity of 0.572 S cm(-1) in the SOEC mode.
Titulo: Preparation and performance evaluation of low temperature SOEC using lithium compounds as electrodes

Sentencas: The excellent hydrogen production performance proves that this new type of electrolysis cell with lithium compounds as electrodes is a promising and potential proton conductive low-temperature SOEC.
Titulo: Preparation and performance evaluation of low temperature SOEC using lithium compounds as electrodes
